settings.top_subheading:
Printverse is a print on demand provider for some of the largest enterprises in the customized print products space. With focus on quality and turnaround time, we have been able scale rapidly with high customer satisfaction rates.

WHY CHOOSE US?

LOWEST PRICING
We’re vertically integrated and own the entire supply chain which allows us to offer high quality products at lowest prices. We're able to offer these prices by eliminating the markups from intermediaries which translates into higher margins for you.

PRODUCT RANGE
Vertical integration allows us to offer a vast assortment of products to choose from'.

QUICK TURNAROUND
Our average turnaround time is 48-72 hours.

FREE TO USE
There are no minimums orders or hefty set up fees waiting for you when you sign-up.

Partner with Printverse today!

settings.question_faqs: Do you ship the products internationally? What are the charges? Who pays custom duty?
settings.answer_faqs:
Yes, we offer international shipping, price for which is mentioned on our shipping page. We do not ship to some countries such as the UAE. 
Please note that the custom duty, if any has to be paid by the customer. Printverse is in no way responsible for any custom duty/taxes.

settings.question_faqs: How do I connect Printverse to my E-Commerce website?
settings.answer_faqs: The API integration is straightforward and it usually takes two to four weeks to connect Printverse to your E-Commerce website.

settings.question_faqs: Where are your manufacturers located?
settings.answer_faqs: Fremont, California.

settings.question_faqs: How do I order a sample?
settings.answer_faqs: Please contact us to order the samples.

settings.question_faqs: Can I customize account access levels to different members on my team?
settings.answer_faqs: Not at this moment

settings.question_faqs: Are there fees for using Printverse? How does pricing and billing work?
settings.answer_faqs: There are no fees for using Printverse. An invoice will be sent to you for the products we print and fulfill based on the agreed terms.

settings.question_faqs: How do I delete my Printverse account?
settings.answer_faqs: Please contact your account manager to delete your account.

settings.question_faqs: How can I receive automatic notifications about order status changes?
settings.answer_faqs: There is a webhook or callback that can be set up to receive automatic notifications. Please refer to the API documentation

settings.question_faqs: How do I track my orders?
settings.answer_faqs: The order status allows you and your customers to track orders. You can send the notification to your customers when the status is changed to shipped.

settings.question_faqs: How do I prepare a receipt for orders?
settings.answer_faqs: We will invoice you every two weeks. The charge on each order will include fulfillment and shipping costs.

settings.question_faqs: I need a list of products that I loaded onto your platform. Is that something you can generate for me?
settings.answer_faqs: You can access your product range in the Printverse dashboard or contact an account manager.

settings.question_faqs: How do taxes work with Printverse?
settings.answer_faqs: Tax may be exempt if a seller permit is provided.

settings.question_faqs: Where can I find invoices for all transactions?
settings.answer_faqs: Your credit card may be required to be on file.  Printverse will invoice you bi-weekly with all transaction information.

settings.question_faqs: Do you provide white label fulfillment?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes.

settings.question_faqs: What levels of partner support do you offer?
settings.answer_faqs: Printverse can support you and your partners.

settings.question_faqs: Will you add a new customized product for my business?
settings.answer_faqs: We are able to source new products for your customers.  Please contact your account manager to discuss.

settings.question_faqs: What is your sample policy?
settings.answer_faqs: Customers have to pay for sample shipment.

settings.question_faqs: What are your policies for reprints, refunds and returns?
settings.answer_faqs: Please contact our customer support to reprint any products with defects.  In rare cases, refunds or returns may be allowed but please contact customer support first.

settings.question_faqs: What is the required image format and size of my design file?
settings.answer_faqs: Each product page in our catalog will contain rules and provide a template under the Print Guidelines section.

settings.question_faqs: What is the bleed area for the product?
settings.answer_faqs: Bleed area is the area for our printing process to avoid white borders.  Bleed area may be cut off or removed after production is completed.

settings.question_faqs: Do you offer bulk order pricing?
settings.answer_faqs: Can be arranged with your Account Manager.

settings.question_faqs: How does Printverse shipping work?
settings.answer_faqs: We support all major shipping methods with UPS, FedEx, USPS. Please refer to the API documentation API Documentation

settings.question_faqs: What return address is printed on the shipping labels?
settings.answer_faqs: It can be your address or your partners' address.

settings.question_faqs: Do you offer flat rates?
settings.answer_faqs: Please contact your account manager to discuss.

settings.question_faqs: Will all items from the same order arrive together?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, unless specified otherwise

settings.question_faqs: Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.answer_faqs: Contact our customer support to change or cancel orders.  If the order is already made or shipped, it may not be possible to change or cancel.

settings.question_faqs: Will my customers know that I use you to fulfill my orders?
settings.answer_faqs: Your customers orders come from you and you alone! we are your team.

settings.question_faqs: When will I receive my order?
settings.answer_faqs: Orders will be produced and shipped out within 48 business hours.  Delivery times will depend on the shipping method used as well as location.

settings.question_faqs: What is the term and service for Printverse?
settings.answer_faqs: Production on orders start as soon as all images and documents are received and verified. Once verified, they are produced within 48 business hours.(Orders may take longer if large quantities) The customer has the legal obligation to ensure the copyrights of the order sent to Printverse.  Printverse is not responsible or liable for any legal or copyrights of all order images, documentation, or related information sent by the customers.  Printverse will not be responsible or refund any product damaged during shipping.

settings.question_faqs: Where can I find information on your API documentation?
settings.answer_faqs: Here

settings.question_faqs: Can you tell me more about PrintVerse technology stack?
settings.answer_faqs: We use Ruby on Rails, Nodejs, and RabbitMQ for our 24/7 api, fulfillment and production processing.  Most of our servers and processes are in the Amazon cloud with redundancy and periodic backups.

settings.question_faqs: How can my customers check the status of their orders if I'm using your API?
settings.answer_faqs: You can get order statuses via an API call or automatic notifications, then send the tracking numbers to your customers.

settings.des_faqs: Below FAQ are some common questions of our customers , if you have other questions, please just send it to support@printversepro.com

settings.title: Custom Block
settings.quote:
Custom CMS block displayed at the left sidebar on the Catalog Page. Put your own content here: text, html, images, media... whatever you like.

There are many similar sample content placeholders across the store. All editable from admin panel.

settings.shipping_returns_content:
Turnaround Time

Orders are processed, packaged and labeled to be picked up by DHL within 72 hours* on average. Once the order tracking number is generated, you can view it in the order status through our dashboard and share it with your customers through our API.

Shipping Time

We aspire to deliver the products as fast as possible to your customers. The total time to delivery includes our turnaround time and the time it takes for our shipping partner to ship the package to it's final destination. The shipping time varies with the delivery locations.
settings.custom_tab_content:
Submit PNG or JPG files

    Submit your image files in PNG or JPG format.

Match the imprint dimensions

    Your submitted image must match the Imprint Dimensions exactly (Width x Height in pixels) for each specified product.

Center images in the logo area

    The pink boxes on the templates show where to position your art/logo to ensure they will be centered.

Keep important assets inside the safe area

    Safe areas are generally within 1/8 of an inch from each edge. Important graphics and text should be inside the safe area (marked with the red line in the template) or they could get cut off. Background color or art can extend to the edges.
